name: Wanted Wizard
description:
Curdle Jam #17

Do you like nice graphics and amazing high quality audio?, well that's not this BUT...................................................... Its kind of fun

I recommend playing in full screen for best experience.

You have the power to summon bullet eating monsters and when they eat bullets they explode and shoot multiple back with twice the power

THINGS YOU MAY NEED TO KNOW:

Shield takes 4 bullets

hearts only heal if you have two hearts

Max currency multiplier is x10.0

Max currency is 99 million

I DID NOT MAKE THE BACKGROUND MUSIC (ITS FREE) 

DOWNLOADED FROM: https://www.chosic.com/
